website_summaries.verdict: An overall high-quality ukulele with a vintage look, although elements of the starter kit underwhelm.
pros: The strings that come on it are top class
Great sound, and stays in tune well
Learn to Play kit includes a tuner, tote bag, and an app
cons: Quality of the app isn't up to standards that you can find for free on sites such as YouTube
Some reports of this option arriving broken

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun instrument to learn!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to playing music and this is has been wonderful! I did end up using Cynthia Lin from YouTube more for beginner-esque things like strumming and learning chords and songs. The app has only been useful for tuning thus far (I'm about a month in). For me, the video's in the app don't show a good enough angle, and the person playing doesn't say a word. No explanation of finger position or anything and I needed a lot more hand holding. Cynthia Lin is the way to go! I didn't even know how the strum! The Kala Ukulele designers should get with her!
customer_reviews.author: Dria94

customer_reviews.title: loved it for 2 days!
customer_reviews.text: i knew it wasn't going to be top of the line but would be a good learning piece. it was used 2 days for short periods...quickly able to learn chords which i loved. woke up 3rd day to the saddle unglued and strings everywhere. there is no contact OR warranty. amazon replaced out of return window. seeing how it's made, i'm sure it will happen again.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN KILIAN

customer_reviews.title: I've already ordered another
customer_reviews.text: What fun. Hubby has been talking about learning for years. When this popped up for $59.99 on a daily deal, I snapped it up, knowing absolutely nothing about the instrument. My son loved it so much I bought another from this brand (NOT this kit, though, because I can't stomach paying twenty bucks more for the same thing). I spent the extra 20 on a padded gig bag, two straps, and strap buttons. The web site lessons are nice. After two days I'm good with 6 chords and some strumming. I wasn't even getting it for me! As other reviews say, the strings have needed tuning each day (minor tweaking), but less and less each day.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship, bridge broke from body after 3 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the Kala App and learning Uke. The issue came about when in the middle of the night I heard a loud snap and woke up to find that bridge of the Uke had broken off from the Uke body. Whatever cheap glue they had used wasn't strong enough so the strings literally pulled the bridge entirely off using just their tension (see photo)! Ridiculous. I did not over tighten the strings (I always used the Kala App tuner to adjust the tension) and also if I had over tightened, then the string itself should have snapped, the bridge should never bust off the body! Absolutely poor craftsmanship, I would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Solid starter, good craftsmanship, real pegs and strings
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Soprano for my granddaughter and the concert for my grandson - pic is the side by side so you can see size difference. Both tune up well, and as all strings, need a few tweaks when new until the “stretch” is worked out. Very nice, play well and sound exactly like a uke is supposed to sound. An excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Shabang

customer_reviews.title: Goes out of tune very fast
customer_reviews.text: I'm very confused about the reviews. I know it's only 50 dollars, but if it doesnt stay in tune long enough to even finish a song then what is the point. It slides out of tune so fast. Very cheaply made. I've gotten a ukelele for less money than this and it was still better. I wouldn't get this for someone who is trying to learn because they would never play it in tune, especially if they had no ear for it. You shouldn't have to worry about that so often. It will just make learning harder because it wont even sound like the song you are trying to learn. Just spend more money and get a better ukelele. 😅
customer_reviews.author: 333blue3

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STAY IN TUNE
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality product. Ukulele does not stay in tune. I am a semi-professional guitar player for 25 years, and I do not think this uke is worth buying, even for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Salemite

customer_reviews.title: Check all brands before choosing this one.
customer_reviews.text: The ukulele itself is very nicely constructed and has a nice sound. The case is very cheaply made. Online tuner is not as nice as the clip on kind that is included with other ukuleles. Other ukuleles have a better canvas type case at a cheaper price. I wouldn’t buy this one again. I would buy the other brand with the nicer canvas case and different tuner.
customer_reviews.author: Barb617

customer_reviews.title: Kala Ukelele
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and I will keep it but it is really a cheap Chinese product. The strings they put on the Uke are the cheapest I have seen. They say to log in for free lessons..I tried 3 times I cannot find it...it goes to their web site which has a bunch of video but no lessons
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Villani

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this. I would tune it and it would go back to being untuned after strumming for 1 single minute. The strings do not hold their placement whatsoever and no matter how many times you tune this thing it will not hold the tune sound. Spend the extra money on a better ukulele unless you just want one to sit and stare at while laying around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tish Moore

customer_reviews.title: App is free trial for a short time
customer_reviews.text: Apparently you have to pay for the app after a 4 day free trial. I bought this as gift for my boyfriend who really wanted to learn, hopefully youtube can be a better help.
customer_reviews.author: E. Petenbrink

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, intonation for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've played guitar for over 40 years and have owned a couple ukuleles. This one plays very well. The intonation is great, which can be an issue on cheaper instruments. It projects well and sounds bright and clear. As with any nylon stringed instrument, it will take at least a day of retuning before the strings stretch and stay in tune. Note: under no circumstances should you pay $5 extra for the "starter package". Just buy the uke. There is literally nothing of value in the starter package. Still a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Coover

customer_reviews.title: The Ukulele Brand to Buy
customer_reviews.text: My first impression was utter shock over how light it is. I did not expect that and was very happy. The next thing that made a big impression was the tuning app. It was so easy and made my first ukulele experience fun. Having a lot of musical experience over the years, I was looking forward to trying out the ukulele and am really glad to have Kala brand as my first. Not only is it a joy, it looks like a piece of art on my fireplace mantle. ....Now to learn to sound like I know what I am doing!
customer_reviews.author: GKPass

customer_reviews.title: Great little instrument
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time and is as described. This is no concert ukulele but for a beginner, it’s a great little instrument. It’s not a cheap crappy toy but a pretty good little instrument—especially for the price. Would make a great gift. The case is a piece of crap but I ordered a new one for just a few bucks and now all is good. The free app is a pretty good one but don’t bother paying for the subscription as you can utube thousands of entries for learning how to play. The app is good for learning the chords and learning how to tune the instrument though so at least give it a try for that. It’s free.
customer_reviews.author: Daebot

customer_reviews.title: Good starter package, great ukulele
customer_reviews.text: The strings are good. It tunes up pretty good after a week. I like the sound and it’s pretty worth it if you’re looking for a decent accompany to light your day up. I’m a college student, and I play the uku for fun so all I could say is that this uku satisfies my need. I just expected that for this price, the package will come with a thicker bag or a rope to wear with it, or extra strings? Something extra, not just the bag, the uku, a small booklet? But what do I know about life lol. Overall, you won’t be disappointed to invest in this ukulele.
customer_reviews.author: Hong Anh

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend's son as a gift. I've played guitar for fifteen years, but never uke. After receiving the item I spent a day fooling around with it before giving it my friend's son (mostly to test it and make sure no issues). Honestly, I can't believe how good it was for the price. I mean you won't be playing a venue with this thing, but to teach yourself some chords and get yourself playing music, what a buy! I'm considering getting myself one just to be able to grab and take places when I don't feel like bringing a full-size guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Nuff

customer_reviews.title: Use the app to tune it.
customer_reviews.text: The app works wonders. If it's been a while, it'll sound a bit off but once you start playing it's great. They sent a booklet with the notes and a few songs so you can try to play something to start off with. Sound vibrates to my heart and brings back nostalgia, nice and loud to you don't have to strum too, too hard like with nylon. My fingers are already used to the strings so it doesn't hurt to me, someone else will have to do a review for that. Great for starting back over/beginners with strong fingers. I...love this thing. Working on giving my new baby a name.
customer_reviews.author: LeiUn

customer_reviews.title: doesn't hold its pitch -- have to keep retuning.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fine for the price, but I have to tune it every 5 minutes. Hopefully, with time it will hold its pitch better, but super annoying for my nephew, who has not yet mastered the art of tuning this. Good thing he has the app. But even for me, who knows how to tune it, super annoying to have to tune it after every song.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Instrument
customer_reviews.text: This is a comprehensive package, for me who has very little knowledge of music. The ukelele itself is quite beautiful and well crafted. One friend who does know music and musical instruments said that it is a quality instrument. I haven't had a lot of time to spend on it, but I downloaded the Kala app and was able to tune the uke fairly easily. I then learned one chord at a time and played the first song in a book I own about playing the uke. I still have a long way to go, but I am confident that I will make progress and play many more songs.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Frau

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bridge was coming unglued. Had to return it after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Flowerpower

customer_reviews.title: Happy child = Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my daughter for Christmas. This is a quality ukulele. The construction is solid. It comes prestrung and has an app for tuning it that actually works. The bag that comes with the kit is just a simple sack. My daughter plays it everyday and has no problems with it at all. The only thing that could have made this kit better is a pic. I would definitely recommend this product and its manufacturer. Now concerning the order process. It was great. The package arrived quickly and undamaged. I give the seller a five star rating also.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Not a toy, this is a great quality instrument
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She goes into the music store with her older sister and has always gravitated to the ukulele's. She's in love with it. It's a very nice quality wood, definitely NOT "toy" quality. It's got a nice bag to keep it in and we even saved the box for her to store it in. I took off one star because I do find that it comes out of tune very easily, but I've heard that this is common with the ukulele. I'm also not very impressed with the app. But overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Agent_CooperTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this product is essentially a big advertisement for their app and other services. There are cheaper Ukuleles on amazon, for the same, or better quality, that also come with actual physical tuners and better cases. The app thats offered is free even if you haven't purchased this product, and the lessons are charged separately. Feeling a bit scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Goldman714

customer_reviews.title: Solid beginner ukulele.
customer_reviews.text: My first ukulele! The app is helpful, from tuning to learning to play. I was able to play a song just a few hours after unboxing the ukulele. It is a soprano, so it’s fairly small, and I do have a little trouble finding room for my fingers in some chords. But still a great, affordable first instrument. This ukulele was a tremendous help during the pandemic. I am a children’s librarian who started doing Storytime from home. By learning ukulele, I was able to add my own music to my programs. And I loved that my Storytime friends could watch me learn something new.
customer_reviews.author: PA Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality starter kit. While everything in this kit is basic, it is not cheap quality. The Uke is a Kala KA-15S mahogany finish with nice detailing around the sound hole. The case is a simple carry sack that will protect your uke from dust and scratches. Instruction booklet will get you up and strumming in short order. Great starter kit if you have never played, or gift for someone interested. Cheap enough to get started, quality to keep around for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ibrew4u

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 4 stars because the ukelele itself is great BUT this whole "starter pack" things isn't true, it's a scam and should be advertised as such. You have to download an app that you have to pay for, it isn't free. I got the 7 day trial of it and as a super beginner it was confusing. It teaches you how to tune it but after that it expects you to play songs and I need something more step by step so I downloaded something different. 5 stars for the uke itself. 1 star the app
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING little instrament
customer_reviews.text: This package is amazing and easy for people of all ages to play. I liked teaching my kiddo so much i bought myself one in the tenor size, that turned out to be a disaster. It looks great, the app is outstanding during the free trial and still has lots of options and training available for free after the free trial is complete! Very hard to resist the 34 bucks for a year worth of the unlocked app, thats about the same cost as one music lesson....100% recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Seeker

customer_reviews.title: WOW! The sound from this little thing is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality from this thing is amazing! It sounds better than the Concert sized Lohanu one I bought. Love this Ukulele! Will look into buying their Concert sized one! Update: after buying a more expensive Concert solid spruce top from Kala, the Soprano still shines! I think I'm in love with this. I've also bought a few enya's the round and pineapple and the sound seems muddy compared to this one. Now I'm looking for a long neck version of the Kala Soprano. Still my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value, Kala makes an easy to play, great little soprano uke!
customer_reviews.text: My first ukulele and I didn't want to spend a fortune on it to see if I could/would learn it and enjoy playing it- SCORE! For around 50 bucks you might not expect a lot but this little gem delivers and I am loving it, as well as the convenience of Kala's mobile-friendly tuning, songbook, chord lessons, etc., SO much teaching! I will love this little beauty and hug it and name it George. Or maybe Vic, I don't know. But I do know I don't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Spears

customer_reviews.title: 12 year old granddaughter LOVED this, I am not a music instrument expert ...
customer_reviews.text: 12 year old granddaughter LOVED this, I am not a music instrument expert but everything seemed well made , I recommend buying a tuner and a beginner music book if you are giving this as a gift to a beginner, we had to go to the guitar center to buy a tuner and a learn to play book, so I wish I would have presented those items at the same time I presented the gift
customer_reviews.author: I Love Sandals

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a couple of months of light use
customer_reviews.text: The sound is reasonable, but unfortunately it broke just after a couple months. Purchased in April, broke by July :(. Very poorly made. Would not recommend to anyone. Very sad as my daughter saved up her money to buy this and it is a piece of junk. She handled it with care, and yet it still fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Steele

customer_reviews.title: my first Kala, but won't be my last!
customer_reviews.text: I am so enjoying the sound of this instrument, it is truly a good instrument, and it comes strung with good strings! I must say as a new player with no background in stringed instruments I'm having a great time with this little beauty! Very happy with my purchase, definitely a real instrument, and only whets my appetite for other Kala ukes!
customer_reviews.author: lalouisianne

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband and it's been a big hit. The uke is really pretty, more than I expected for the price. The sound of the instrument is pleasing and he doesn't need to have practiced for hours in order to get a good sound out of it. I recommend this a great value and good option for a starter ukelele
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Not Exactly What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I may have misread or not read the description all the way through, but I thought this would come with an actual tuner. But it actually just uses an app. I will a little disappointed about that because anyone can get that app. The book is ok. Overall its not a bad purchase. Just not exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenAshley1145

customer_reviews.title: Instrument is good
customer_reviews.text: I like the Ukulele however the Kala App has been very frustrating to work with. Very little direction as to how to utilize the tuner app, etc. They also try to sell you songs which is fine but this is about learning the cords, tuning, etc. Got to do all that first before you can even consider buying songs.
customer_reviews.author: Sandraelaine

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele has been great! I totally love it! However, the A string has issues and is always going out of tune while I play. :/ (although that might just be an operator error). I use the PanoTuner app instead of the Kala app, because it is easier to use and more explanatory. Also, the app does not explain chords very well. I learned everything I know from Youtube. Overall, this ukulele sounds great, and the price is good friends with my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful Ukulele. It has an amazing sound and quality to it. It holds a tune really well. The app that comes with the Ukulele is also amazing! If you don't understand how to tune by ear, you don't need to because the app has a tuner. Even physical tuners that I have bought do not compare to the app tuner. The chord book is useful for beginners, who don't want to constantly google chords. The bag is what you would expect, it isn't anything special but the strap on it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Ventola

customer_reviews.title: Nice little thing for yourself
customer_reviews.text: To begin with, I'm no craftsmen, woodworker, builder. But in my eyes for a person wanting to begin with the Ukelele, it's comfortable, looks good, and is a solid piece of work. If you're new to the uke, this really isn't that expensive and produces decent quality sound for your purposes. Keep in mind though what type of Ukelele you'll need and that you'll need to tune the Ukelele a little more in the beginning then once in a while if you keep it for 2+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ukulele!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this ukulele for our daughter andfor our son for Christmas. They both sound and play great. We have used the clip on tuner that comes with the other one much more than the tuning app that comes with this one. Having spent a few decades learning the guitar, I was amazed at how fast both kids (11 and 15) picked up playing the ukulele. Really fun.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cragun

customer_reviews.title: This was bought as a gift for my husband (along ...
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift for my husband (along with a very LOUD Hawaiian print shirt). He's got everything known to man so he's really hard to buy for. A few years ago we started trying to buy gifts that were far from what would be expected. With this gift I won! The dog now hates me because husband enjoys driving her crazy with his vocal and musical skills.
customer_reviews.author: Kilmarlic

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Beginner Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: Got this ukulele as a Xmas gift for my 10-yr old daughter. She was introduced to ukulele by her music teacher at school this year and expressed an interest. I agree with others, that this is a really nice looking and well made instrument. My daughter really likes it, just has to practice to get familiar with chords and strumming style, etc...only drawback I’ve encountered after a couple of days is the strings have to be returned after each session. I use the Kala tuner on my iPhone and it’s easy to use - it’s just kind of a drag to have to tune all four strings every time my daughter wants to practice.
customer_reviews.author: A Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it..
customer_reviews.text: Ukulele feels so cheap, and it looks very tiny. This instrument does not keep its tune and it is definitely not worth the price and all the other high reviews. The “Free” guide is only free for a few days before they charge you exorbitant fees.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Music Lovers who want More!
customer_reviews.text: We are a family of musicians, but mostly orchestra (cello, mostly). My son had been wanting to learn Ukulele, and loves this little guy! It’s beautiful, lightweight, easy to tune, and simple to learn. He won’t be playing any sold out stadiums with it, but it keeps him entertained and it’s not on a screen! :)
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Great Uke!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I now know I’d prefer a thinner Ike but still, my first one and sounds great! I’m learning from YouTube. Found an easier app for tuning. The app that comes with it seemed off key. I used to play a lot of piano. All in all what I wanted was the uke. Great price, great craftsmanship! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S

customer_reviews.title: Great for out-of-commission musicians!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome instrument. I only deducted a star because the carry bag has a big ole slice going through the front, as shown in the pic. Overall the instrument is great quality and the bag is perfect to tote it around. My dad had surgery so he can’t play his upright or electric bass for a while. We got him his and it’s perfect. It’s nice and light so he can hold it comfortably and learning to play will keep him busy while he heals.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother with the tuner app - otherwise, a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: The app is extremely frustrating to use and I bought an external tuner. It cannot hear the two middle string notes appropriately, but tunes the outer two strings perfectly. The quality of the kit is excellent and I do recommend it, as long as you go outside of Kala for your tuner needs. If there is another beginner ukulele you are looking at and the app is causing you to lean toward this one, don't let it be the reason you get the Kala.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Fun to Play
customer_reviews.text: Love my Kala ukulele. Perfect size for me and came with a little carrying pouch and starter book. The Kala app is nice to use as well. I played the guitar decades ago, so this has been a nice, and much easier, return to playing a stringed instrument.
customer_reviews.author: MAD

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE app. Nice Uke.
customer_reviews.text: Uke seems nice but TERRIBLE app. DO NOT count on it for even the tuning. Super buggy. Was so disappointed after spending hours because I can’t start trying to learn tunes when it can’t even be tuned. Would work if you have a personal instructor to help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter uke
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little ukulele. The strings don’t take long to stretch out so they hold tune well and sounds great. The Kala app is a really useful tool in conjunction with YouTube tutorials. If you’re considering buying a ukulele to learn, this is a great starter.
customer_reviews.author: Celina Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Beginner's Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ukulele. Easy to pick up, easy to learn. The Kala app is also useful, but there are only a handful of free songs. But, I've found plenty of tutorials online as well, so it's been a fun experience to learn on this ukulele!
customer_reviews.author: Amber R

customer_reviews.title: so for me this is a perfect instrument. It's the perfect leaner's uke
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of a newb at the ukulele, so for me this is a perfect instrument. It's the perfect leaner's uke. The Kala apps (Android and IOS) are very helpful. Kala is actually a recognizable brand when it comes to ukuleles I found out. Once I've more or less mastered this instrument I will be looking at their higher quality items for sure! Even in the low end/beginner line, this instrument has fantastic workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: MR Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Great ukulele!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to learn how to play an instrument during quarantine and purchased this little lovely ukulele. It’s great for beginners! It comes with a carrying bag so you can take it places easily. Would highly recommend for anyone who’s interested in starting up their ukulele skills!
customer_reviews.author: marcelle romero

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a good way to stay busy and learn something new during quarantine. When it’s tuned, it sounds great and is a lot of fun. Your fingers will need to get used to the strings. Get ready for some new calluses.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: No Tuner
customer_reviews.text: The description of the "kit" is misleading as it states that it comes with a tuner. Even the little instruction booklet tells you how to read the tuner, but no tuner included. I was frustrated and felt deceived. The description needs to be changed. Until that is done, I wouldn't recommend this "kit".
customer_reviews.author: Felting Artist

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner instrument
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for both my granddaughter and myself. We’re taking lessons together. This’s a great starter instrument, has a good tone and holds key well. Nice design, noted by our music teacher, as well. We use the free Kala app to tune before each practice and lesson, very useful app.
customer_reviews.author: Phyll from ABQ

customer_reviews.title: This could not have been better! I suggest buying one for everyone you know ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 42 year old neice who is a corporate executive. I thought she needed something that would force her to have down time. She's played it every day since then and now (March), both of her kids have ukes and are playing with her. This could not have been better! I suggest buying one for everyone you know -- easy to learn, fun to sing and play together. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: joyous!

customer_reviews.title: this instrument was low cost price point and perfect for a novice leisure pursuit
customer_reviews.text: This beginner ukulele even wowed my daughter's instructor. I was surprised to see how impressed she was when she saw it at her 1st lesson and commented on the high craftsmanship of this instrument. As compared to my daughter's viola ... this instrument was low cost price point and perfect for a novice leisure pursuit. Great size, sound, strings, finish. Comes with everything to get started.... A great match for my Uke lover!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn H

customer_reviews.title: I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: It was a pretty little ukulele- bit I spent more time tuning than playing it. Will not stay tuned. Update - I am a novice and found out that tuning a new ukulele to where it will stay tuned takes a little time on the front end. It's pretty and good quality for a beginner and I was told each string takes about 20 minutes of constant, tune, pluck, tune, pluck to stay tuned but when I'm done it is supposed to stay pretty well. My brother is a guitar teacher and said that this was a good brand choice for me. Can't wait until I'm playing it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Renee' Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Uke!
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship is amazing on this Kala! Its beautifully pieced together, great quality and great sound. My only dislike is the "free lessons" toted in the description are of a 7 day trial. (but there are plenty of youtube tutorials out there) I also find that it comes out of tune rather quickly but overall great price for the product received. it's been a great learner uke!
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Christmas. We have had a blast trying to play it...we aren't there yet :-). After tuning it a few times it seems to be holding it's tune better...guessing the strings stretch. Sounds really nice when you play a real note.
customer_reviews.author: Lee H. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, sounds amazing and the app is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this uke! So much fun to learn on and to play! Hearing me play made my dad want to buy a guitar and start playing again. This uke is beautiful and good quality!!!!! Don’t forget to re tune it every time you play when you first get it. The strings will wear down and you won’t always have to but at the beginning you will. The app has useful songs. Although you’ll probably never play them it’s good to learn cords that way and the tuner on it works just like a real one. The case is just fabric. I recommend you buy a good case
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Arehart💛

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this a 3 only because it looks very nice. This does not stay in tune though. It's really not an instrument like other reviews claim. Stick to paying more for Kala ukes if you want to play music.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ukulele. It sounds good but I haven't practiced much and I make it sound like two cats fighting over a sardine. It is good to go and every positive thing written about it is true.
customer_reviews.author: Devil Doc

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my seven-year-old for Christmas last year. I think it is a good ukulele for a small child with small hands who is just learning. Although the sound quality may not be the same as one that is $100 or more, I think it is actually pretty decent for the price and would recommend it for anyone learning to play.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as my first ukulele, since I didn’t want to invest a lot of money initially. It sounds and looks great! I’m very happy with it. The tuner app is OK, but I got an inexpensive clip-on tuner that I think is handier. Also got “The Daily Ukulele (365)” book which I have found to serve my needs better than the online lessons.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Great uke!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this and she was already learning a new song on the day I gave it to her. The booklet that teaches you how to use it and the notes is great. And the online resource is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beginner, but know how to tune it.
customer_reviews.text: My son used this for his fifth grade talent show and won. He loved this, and got a lot of compliments on it. It's very fancy compared to some. The case is just a cloth bag, so it easily falls out of tune while carrying it, yet the bag is still nice. Other than having to tune it after carrying it in the bag each time he used it we have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Love. Bought second one!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent instrument especially for beginners. The quality for the price is really great. It keeps its tune really well. Would highly recommend as a starting instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beckner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, wood ukulele
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood ukulele for beginner. My daughter takes lessons and this is the real deal. Not the plastic kind you buy at the swap meet! It’s a great quality ukulele, and priced really well!
customer_reviews.author: Kelekea

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner instrument.  Aesthetically pleasing to the ear and to the eye. Tuning app is a great help.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. The brand was recommended to us by a person who deals with musical instruments. The instrument itself is lovely just to look at. The booklet that came with the ukulele was helpful to get him started, and the tuning app is invaluable. Expect to become very familiar with the tuning app, especially in the beginning, as the strings will naturally stretch a lot and the ukulele will need tuned frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Webb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It looked great at first but after two months the wooden piece the strings are attached to just broke off. I guess I can glue it back but they should have used a proper glue in the first place!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: A relaxing hobby
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it, and I find him retreating to a back bedroom to practice. Wish the lessons online were available longer, as with life and busyness, its not always easy to make the time in the short span allotted. It has a nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Happy Strumming
customer_reviews.text: Build quality and sound is outstanding for the price. This is exactly what I wanted as a gift for my granddaughter. It should serve her well for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking Texan

customer_reviews.title: beautiful simple instrument!
customer_reviews.text: - beautiful wood color - seems durable - you need patience to learn, obviously. - case is a sinch sack, but it gets the job done! - easy to tune through the app and sounds beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: abourge

customer_reviews.title: strings are in wrong order
customer_reviews.text: This uke is not strung correctly. The top string should be the thickest string and it's not.........this messes it up when tuning. There is not where to comment to the seller...I'd like to exchange this for the correct uke and proper strings.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended as Learn to Play
customer_reviews.text: As far as the instrument itself goes, it seems to be very nice. As a true beginner, the promotion of this item as a “learn to play” truly misses the bar. I should have noticed there was no strap which gives a beginner a certain amount of stability. The tuning app versus a real tuner falls short and the case is not much more than a glorified paper bag. I don’t see that this starter package is a good value at all. I will give the two stars for the instrument itself.
customer_reviews.author: S.Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ukulele, NO TUNER, and Watch the packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the title stating that it comes with a "tuner, and app" it does not come with a tuner. This is misleading. The box came exactly as pictured...unsecured with the top easily separated from the bottom, I am surprised it made it to my house in good condition, and because it is clearly marked on the outside what is inside, there was no way this is going to be a surprise for my Daughter as intended. The Ukulele itself seems well made and is very decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Avg Joe

customer_reviews.title: It is a great ukulele and sounds beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this product. It is a great ukulele and sounds beautiful! This product is made of good quality and I would recommend it to others that are looking to purchase a ukulele for themselves or for others. It is great for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie D.

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument!
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele is perfect for learning and playing the ukulele. It is not expensive, yet has fantastic sound. It came packaged with all the accessories promised, though I prefer a clip-on tuner to an app. The tote bag for storing and carrying is very handy with adjustable strings allowing it to be carried easily on your back. The little booklet has enough information to get you started. Since I play guitar, I found it took me about an hour to learn how to play it and I have been having loads of fun with it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Shulamit D.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR BEGINNERS AND INTERMEDIATE USERS
customer_reviews.text: GOOD QUALITY, AND READY FOR A BEGINNER TO LEARN ON. IT DIDN’T COME WITH ANYTHING MORE BEYOND THE INSTRUMENT ITSELF. BUT IT IS PRETTY DECENT IN QUALITY AND WORTH THE PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDON

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument, good quality, stays in tune
customer_reviews.text: What a gorgeous instrument, the wood is just beautiful. It stays in tune and my daughter is having a blast learning how to play it. In fact, it's almost 2 months past Christmas and she still plays with this thing every day. She even learned the chords for Into the West and plays it with me while I play the piano. So glad we bought this for her.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner pack for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner pack! Yea I agree with other reviews, the app is a joke lol. It takes a while to stay in tune but after playing it for a month, it became more stable in tune.
customer_reviews.author: BB-9G

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the best ukuleles available! Beautiful look, beautiful sound. High quality tuners. Tuners really sets this apart from other similar ukuleles. Will guy again
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne s

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This little ukulele is super cute and good for beginners. It has a hard time staying in tune for any length of time though. I’m hoping that will get better in time.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The thing holding the strings to the Ukulele became unglued and broke off. We had it for 6 months and played it maybe a dozen times. It was sitting in the closet when it broke. Overall it seemed like a good quality instrument before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pang

customer_reviews.title: Fun little uke
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners and anyone who wants to play/learn ukulele in a casual way. It has to be tuned often, but that seems typical of a lower cost uke. I have had a lot of fun with this and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We be Jammin
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun, my first Uke so not sure what to expect, always going out of tune but I think that is the nature of the beast. Really fun to learn and play new songs on new instrument. The tuning app on the phone works great too, song list to play is long and helps you learn the chords but they are not so much fun to play. Writing your own songs is much more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Shane L. Duvall

customer_reviews.title: It's a good Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after looking at other Ukuleles for several months. It's just a Ukulele and a carrying bag. It's nothing super special. The sound is good and the tuner is also good. I don't use the videos they recommend, I just go find other videos.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Russell

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this as a gift for my teenage granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I asked my granddaughter if she liked the ukekele and all of the other questions and all I heard was she liked it and that is all. Why cant teenagers talk?
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Snark SN6X Clip-On Tuner for Ukulele to get a perfect tune quickly and easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my 12 year old daughter. In no time she was playing real songs simply by watching YouTube tutorials. She loves it and plays it constantly. It seems well made and is holding up well. Tip: Buy the Snark SN6X Clip-On Tuner for Ukulele to get a perfect tune quickly and easily. Felt picks are also useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk VanOoteghem

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful and for the price it’s definately worth it for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my daughter.. it’s her 1st one. She loves it! It’s beautiful and for the price it’s definately worth it for beginners! The tone and sound is amazing it’s easy to tune! Comes with a little black back to carry it in. I also bought music books for beginners! She’s really taken off with this and appreciates making her own music more..
customer_reviews.author: Eydie B

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, High Quality Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: This is a great uke for any level. It is made very well, stays in tune, and sounds great. Don't let the price fool you. This is not just a toy. It is a high quality instrument, and you will love the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Koenen

customer_reviews.title: Best Ukulele for all people.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great deal, my daughter loved it big time! And from day one, she started to make her first melody on it. Easy to setup. 5 STARS with no doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Moon Light

customer_reviews.title: Great ukelele for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for someone interested in playing. The ukulele itself is well made and sounds good when tuned. The little bag that came with it is kinda cheap, but the ukelele fits in it just fine. The tuner app works well, and the booklet that comes with it shows you how to tune it and play a few chords, and has a few tunes to accompany it. It also gives you a URL for videos to watch online. I've really enjoyed learning how to play so far.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: A great beginners instrument.
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for a Yukelele and his school music teacher recommended this brand. It has a great app to help tune and provide guidance on learning to play!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product But Small
customer_reviews.text: Great product but a bit small for my average-sized adult hands, which made it hard to play. Traded it for the biggerand couldn't be happier. Fun to play, and their teaching app is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little ukulele
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased I read the reviews from others who purchased this ukulele ! Very good reviews, I was not disappointed at all. Very good craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.author: K Swenson

customer_reviews.title: very bad fret spacing
customer_reviews.text: The frets are in the wrong place. I have tuned the ukulele strings (G, C, E, A) but when I go to play a chord, the notes in the chord are all too flat or sharp. When I have the C string tuned to C and I press on the second fret to create a D, the D pitch is very flat. The only reason I can think of why this is happening is, that the frets are placed incorrectly. The spacing between the frets are off and it creates dissonant pitches. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Larsen

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: aaa It’s adorable! This ukulele is a little smaller than I expectdd, but it seems perfect for my little hands. The package actually got here 3 days early, but sadly, the ukulele came before the tuner,so I resort to using the Kala app. The app’s a little off, but it’s really good. The gig bag came with the ukulele and both are in good condition. The sound is nice, and the strings are gentle on the fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Cooldude

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: When i first ordered this it never came ! After contacting Amazon they sent out another one. Its a good little starter ukulele and my daughter loves it her only complaint is that it does not stay tuned very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mom oh 7

product_meta.title: Official Kala Learn to Play Ukulele Soprano Starter Kit, Satin Mahogany – Includes online lessons, tuner app, and booklet (KALA-LTP-S)
product_meta.description: The Official Kala Ukulele Starter Kit comes with everything you need to start playing today. It includes a high-quality mahogany soprano ukulele with Aquila strings, quality open gear tuners, and GraphTech NuBone nut and saddle. The kit also includes a Kala logo tote bag, a 20-page Quick Start Guide with information about your new ukulele, and all the tips you need to get started! Learn to play songs in minutes with Kala’s FREE, easy to follow online lessons through the Kala Brand Music website.
feature_bullets: Kala Ukulele, known for high-quality instruments, is the most recognized and sought-after ukulele brand in the world. Kala ukuleles are the instrument of choice for schools - more people learn to play on a Kala than any other ukulele brand

The kit includes a Kala logo tote bag, a 20-page Quick Start Guide with information about your new ukulele, and all the tips you need to get started! Learn to play songs in minutes with Kala’s FREE, easy to follow online lessons through the Kala Brand Music website.

It includes a high-quality Mahogany Soprano Ukulele with traditional Polynesian Shark Teeth laser etched rosette, Aquila strings from Italy, quality open gear tuners, and GraphTech NuBone nut and saddle.
Kala ukuleles are played by some of the most renowned players around the world including: twenty one pilots, Vance Joy, dodie, EatMyUke, The Ukulele Teacher, and Zac Brown.
SOPRANO UKULELE – This is the most common size of ukulele, and the smallest, with the shortest scale length and tightest fret spacing – tuned G C E A.
What makes the ukulele a great instrument to begin on is that you don’t need a lot of accessories to be successful. We can help you get in tune and start playing songs today!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,680 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
